He hears Talon on the other end. He ma=

ure of his sonar systems.

With a slightly more casual attitude, Tucson sig=
hs, shrugs, and without much on the line of body language, implements his s=
onar system and programs a scrambling frequency which only effects those in=

t if he were to raise the wave length of the scrambler in their radius. He =
keeps his guard up and cross bow at the ready, just in case something were =
to go wrong.

"Hmmm, looks like someone doesn't know how to think outside t=
he box."

If he played his cards right, Tucson wouldn't have to resort to v=
iolent actions against Nightstrike or Lamia. He wanted to see them captured=
 and brought to Lord Perseus for judgement. He waits patiently to see if hi=
s tactics work.
